div.div: Sul Ross St. vs. Mary Hardin-Baylor

tr.td: SRSU wins toss. Defers to 2nd half. UMHB receives on south end.
Zach Roberson kickoff 54 yards to the UMHB11, Chris Wimby return 21 yards to the UMHB32 (Jimmy Foster).
Zach Anderson pass complete to Marcus Wimby for 26 yards to the SRSU42, 1ST DOWN UMHB (Bra. Thornton).
Zach Anderson rush for 16 yards to the SRSU26, 1ST DOWN UMHB (DJ Jones;Bra. Thornton).
Zach Anderson pass incomplete to Keith Reineke.
M. Carpenter rush for 9 yards to the SRSU17 (Zach Roberson).
M. Carpenter rush for 2 yards to the SRSU15, 1ST DOWN UMHB (Dillon Wolfe).
